page.title: 01HOME LIFE
page.content: I LIVE ABOUT 7 MILES AWAY FROM THE CITY CENTRE.WALKING AROUND OUR D SQUARE WE NOTICED THESE TYPES OF HOUSES:DETACHED SEMI-DETACHED TERRACED BUNGALOWS AS WELL AS HOUSE MAISONETTES AND FLATS DETACHED AND SEMI ARE PRIVATELY OWNED. THE RESTIS THAT OR COUNCIL PROPERTY.MY HOUSE IS AT THE END OF A TERRACE SO WE FEEL THAT WE ARE SEMI-DETACHED.AS I GO IN THROUGH THE FRONT DOOR I AM IN THE PORCH WHERE WE HAVE OUR PHONE.ANOTHER DOOR AND I AM IN THE HALL FROM WHERE I CAN GO TO ANY OF THE 3 BEDROOMS.DOWN- STAIRS WE HAVE A LOUNGE,LOBBY,KITCHEN AND BATHROOM.WE HAVE A PORCH FOR THE BACK-GARDEN.WE HAVE A SWING.MY DAD GROWS VEGETABLES.MY NAME IS APRIL.THERE RE 4 PEOPLE IN MY FAMILY.MY BROTHER AND I EACH HAVE OUR OWN ROOMS.I LIKE MY HOUSE BECAUSE IT IS CONVENIENTLY SITUATED FOR US ALL.S
